meanings.definition: A type of pale lager beer originating from Pilsen, Czech Republic.
meanings.sent1: At the party, everyone enjoyed the refreshing pilseners.
meanings.sent2: The bar offers a variety of pilseners for beer enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The pilseners in the fridge were so cold, they shivered.
meanings.sent4: The golden pilseners sparkled like liquid sunshine in the glasses.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the pilseners filled the room, enticing all to take a sip.

meanings.definition: Plural form of pilsener, referring to multiple bottles or glasses of the beer.
meanings.sent1: The waiter carried a tray full of pilseners to the table.
meanings.sent2: Friends clinked their pilseners together in a toast.
meanings.sent3: The pilseners lined up on the bar like soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent4: The bubbles in the pilseners danced merrily as they were poured.
meanings.sent5: The sound of opening pilseners was music to their ears at the celebration.
